content.stem: (photo) Choose the statement that best describes the picture.

choices.A: A woman is standing in front of a shelf of books in a library.
choices.B: A family is sitting on a sofa and watching television in a living room.
choices.C: A man is cleaning windows on the outside of a building.
choices.D: Some workers are unloading boxes from a truck.

content.rationale: The scene takes place in a living room with a family watching TV. The other statements show library, outdoor cleaning, or delivery work.
